name: Helix - Stack Ball
description:
Helix Stack Ball is a free ball game, highly addictive and easy to get the hang of.

Helix Stack Ball is an exciting free game that helps you relieve daily stress through falling down at a high speed. The deeper you get, the more fun you will find! Embark on an exciting adventure to the center of the Earth!

How To Play
>One-touch easy-to-learn controls, just slide your finger!
>Jump over obstacles to help the monster get to the end.
